mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_NUMBER, O.USER_NUMBER, TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDER_DATE, O.ORDER_STATUS_NUMBER , OD.ORDER_DETAIL_COUNT, OD.ORDER_DETAIL_NUMBER , P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE , OS.ORDER_STATUS_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(JOR.ORDER_REVIEW_NUMBER) FROM JUMAK_ORDER_REVIEW JOR WHERE JOR.ORDER_DETAIL_NUMBER = OD.ORDER_DETAIL_NUMBER AND JOR.USER_NUMBER = O.USER_NUMBER) REVIEW_COUNT FROM JUMAK_ORDER O JOIN JUMAK_ORDER_DETAIL OD on O.ORDER_NUMBER = OD.ORDER_NUMBER JOIN JUMAK_PRODUCT P ON OD.PRODUCT_NUMBER = P.PRODUCT_NUMBER JOIN JUMAK_ORDER_STATUS OS on O.ORDER_STATUS_NUMBER = OS.ORDER_STATUS_NUMBER WHERE TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND USER_NUMBER = #{userNumber} AND O.ORDER_STATUS_NUMBER IN(1,2,3,4,5,6)
